extendedInfo.description: This New multi-platform tool is quick easy way to take a poll on any subject against a live audience.The app has an inapp purchase (1.99$) for putting up a poll.App provides users with an essential tool to Create a poll on the go, right from your phone and share the generated Poll Code with your friends, business, audience, classroom, customers, network, etc., App will give instant feedback on any topic or question. Voters can participate using any mobile device or the website www.createpoll.mobi, for free. See instant result of your poll with graphical data.Imagine getting instant feedback from audience any big just for 1.99$. very useful in seminar, corporate environment or even friends.Share your poll questions on social network for friends to answers.FOR PROMOTIONAL OFFER THE APPLICATION IS FREE TILL 1ST OF APRIL 2013

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: I use the application and  feeling  really nice that its very easy to find views on different polls
reviews.author: arvind lamba

reviews.title: Gr8 App
reviews.comment: Appliction is much usefule to take opinion of others instantly.
reviews.author: ajay singh pal

reviews.title: Bullshit
reviews.comment: You have to pay two dollars to send a poll
reviews.author: Alexis West
